content:
<rule id="javaee-technology-usage-00903" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile as="xml-file" matches="//p:entity-mappings/@version[windup:matches(self::node(), '{v}')]">
                    <namespace prefix="p" uri="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/orm"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL" version="{v}">JPA Mapping XML</technology-tag>
            </perform>
            <where param="v">
                <matches pattern="(3.0|3.1)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
